snippet: If the NHL needs a compelling reason to compete in the next Winter Olympics, Bill Daly says the league hasn't found one yet....
lead_paragraph: If the NHL needs a compelling reason to compete in the next Winter Olympics, Bill Daly says the league hasn't found one yet.

headline.main: NHL Still Searching for Reason to Play at 2018 Winter Games
headline.print_headline: NHL Still Searching for Reason to Play at 2018 Winter Games
